aboutUs.subtitle: Who we are and what drives us

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: The Fotowettbewerb Bernbeuren is an initiative that brings photography and community together. We believe that every person has a unique perspective and can share it through the art of photography.
mission.paragraph2: Our goal is to create a platform where photographers from the region and beyond can present their work, compete with each other, and learn from one another.

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.description: We promote artistic expression and innovative perspectives

community.title: Community
community.description: We create a space for exchange and mutual inspiration

fairness.title: Fairness
fairness.description: We ensure a transparent and fair competition

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We set high standards for all submitted work

team.title: Our Team
team.paragraph1: Behind the Fotowettbewerb Bernbeuren is a dedicated team of photography enthusiasts, organizers, and volunteers. We work on a voluntary basis to make this competition an unforgettable experience for all participants.
team.paragraph2: From technical implementation to jury work to organizing the exhibition - everyone on the team contributes their expertise and passion to the success of the competition.

section1.title: 1. Responsible Party
section1.text: Responsible for data processing on this website is: [Your Name / Company Name] [Your Street and House Number] [Your Postal Code and City] [Your Email Address] [Your Phone Number (optional)]

section2.title: 2. Collection of Access Data (Server Log Files)
section2.text: The host of this website automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits to us. These are: browser type and version, operating system used, referrer URL (previously visited page), hostname of the accessing computer, time of server request, IP address. This data serves the technical administration of the website, ensuring the security of our IT systems, and optimizing our offer.

section3.title: 3. Web Analytics with Google Analytics
section3.text: This website uses Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google Ireland Limited ("Google"). Google Analytics uses so-called "cookies", text files that are stored on your computer and enable an analysis of your use of the website.

section4.title: 4. Handling of Photos and Personal Data during Upload

subsection1.title: 4.1. Uploading Photos
subsection1.text: When you upload photos to our website, we process the following data: the uploaded photo itself, the time of upload, the IP address of the uploading device (for abuse prevention). You have the option to voluntarily add personal information (such as your name, a title, or a description) to the photo.

subsection2.title: 4.2. Transfer of Usage Rights (License) and Revocation
subsection2.text: By uploading the photo, you agree to transfer the usage rights to the photo to the website operator. This allows us to publish the photo on our website. You can revoke this consent at any time.

section5.title: 5. Data Subject Rights
section5.text: You have the right at any time to: request information about your processed personal data (Art. 15 GDPR), request correction of inaccurate data (Art. 16 GDPR), request deletion of your data (Art. 17 GDPR), request restriction of processing (Art. 18 GDPR), the right to data portability (Art. 20 GDPR), revoke your consent (Art. 7(3) GDPR), object (Art. 21 GDPR), file a complaint with a supervisory authority (Art. 77 GDPR).

whatIs.title: What is the Fotowettbewerb Bernbeuren?
whatIs.paragraph1: The Fotowettbewerb Bernbeuren is an annual competition for photography enthusiasts from the region and beyond. Whether hobbyist or professional - everyone is welcome to submit their best shots and share them with others.
whatIs.paragraph2: The platform allows participants to upload their photos, have them evaluated by a jury, and ultimately crown the most popular images through public voting.

goals.title: Project Goals
goals.goal1: Promoting photography culture in the Bernbeuren region
goals.goal2: Creating a platform for exchange and networking among photographers
goals.goal3: Presenting the diverse photographic talents of our community
goals.goal4: Organizing a public exhibition of the best works

step1.description: Photographers can upload their best shots through the platform

step2.title: Jury Evaluation
step2.description: An expert jury reviews and evaluates all submitted photos

step3.title: Public Gallery
step3.description: Approved photos are presented in the public gallery

step4.title: Public Voting
step4.description: Visitors can vote for their favorite images

step5.title: Exhibition & Award Ceremony
step5.description: The best photos are exhibited and winners are honored
